{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = F12a.front.png |image1_size = 300px |caption = Barracuda NextGen Firewall F12a |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://campus.barracuda.com/product/cloudgenfirewall/doc/78152895/f12-revision-a/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Barracuda |model = CloudGen Firewall |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = F12a |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = BNHW00A/BNGF12a |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = CB-6988 REV A3 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Celeron;N3350; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_cores2 = 1 |cpu1_total_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1_type2 = x86-64 |cpu1_type2_rev = |cpu1spd = 2.4 GHz <!-- doc? --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.1 GHz
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25U6473FM21-10G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BYK0; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth2chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth3chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth4chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth5chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0D:48
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;0.97;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.38.7;Barracuda Cloudgen Firewall 7.1.3-061;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, mSATA, SATA 3.0, USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ-45 console |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, power switch, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |addchip = 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6791D;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;2;,,, DisplayPort to VGA Converter;Chrontel;CH7517;;1;,,, Parallel Port Single Termination Network;STMicro;ST1284;;1;,,, Dual Output 3 & 2 Phase Controller w/Single Intel Proprietary Interface;ON Semi;NCP81243;;1;,,, Eight Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB803D;;1;,,, 16V 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter w/Adjustable Current Limit;MPS;MPQ8633A;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;National Semiconductor;LM358;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;3;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel Enhancement Mode Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP6923GMT;;1;,,, 30V 160A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS8820;;1;,,, 30V 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7682;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel HexFET Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4435DY;;1;,,, Dual D-Type Flip-Flop w/Set and Reset;NXP;74LVC74AD;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.200.200 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = ngf1r3wall |manuf = AEWIN |manuf_model = SCB-6998A |manuf_rev = BC2 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 590 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CB-6988 REV. A3" is silkscreened on both sides of board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] N3350 @1.1-2.4GHz (Dual-Core) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3L) DRAM *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash, 128GB SATA SSD *PCI: 1x PCIe, 1x mSATA slots *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://campus.barracuda.com/product/cloudgenfirewall/doc/78152895/f12-revision-a/ Product information]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/barracuda_networks/barracuda_networks_f12a |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/barracuda_networks/f12a |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = x86 |subtarget = 64 |arch = x86_64 |support_started_version = 22.03.2 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
